title: Wild Petals: No Rules to Love Art Show
desc: With an art scene as prominent and ever-changing as New York?s, you won?t want to miss this essential exhibit and social mixer. Presenting: Wild Petals: No Rules to Love an extraordinary visual experience featuring works painted exclusively by Symone Wong and Melissa Sutherland. Through life and love, these artists have captured their hearts on canvas to share with you. Please click the link below to RSVP and donate.
